author: felicity
msg: Razor2 calls Net::Ping which uses alarm() to timeout.  Unfortunately
that kills our timeout alarm() for the Razor2 calls.  Doh!  Added
in alarms after the get_server_info() call (the one that calls
Net::Ping) to reset our timeout.  It's not great, but I think it'll
stop the "razor check/report hangs" type problem.

author: felicity
msg: Adding 3 new rules to see how they work in a larger corpus set.
